column1: === Clock Tower ===
The major of Sungai Petani is a clock tower on the main street
column2: Jalan Ibrahim. The clock tower was built in 1936. It is 12.1 m in height. It is topped by a dome-shaped and gold coloured structure. The tower was a present from Lim Lean Teng to George V and Queen Mary to commemorate the Silver Jubilee.

column1: === Gunung Jerai ===

column3: is the famous Gunung Jerai. Gunung Jerai is 1
